# The `DeclContextTree` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class gives a tree-like API to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a> that stores the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontext">DeclContext</a> objects. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This class gives a tree-like API to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a> that stores the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontext">DeclContext</a> objects.

It holds the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> where these objects will be allocated.

Definition at line 129 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/include/llvm/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinkerdeclcontext-h">DWARFLinkerDeclContext.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Typedefs

### ResolvedPathsMap {#af9b826e46e32348ab09cb5de5cfe2ab2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::dwarf&#95;linker::classic::DeclContextTree::ResolvedPathsMap =  DenseMap&lt;std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt;, StringRef&gt;</>}>
Cached resolved paths from the line table.

The key is &lt;UniqueUnitID, FileIdx&gt;.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/include/llvm/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinkerdeclcontext-h/#l00156">156</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/include/llvm/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinkerdeclcontext-h">DWARFLinkerDeclContext.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### getChildDeclContext() {#a4bd9844a95feccd824a78e62c476f423}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>PointerIntPair&lt; DeclContext &#42;, 1 &gt; llvm::DeclContextTree::getChildDeclContext (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontext">DeclContext</a> &amp; Context, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdie">DWARFDie</a> &amp; DIE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/compileunit">CompileUnit</a> &amp; Unit, bool InClangModule)</>}>
Get the child of <em>Context</em> described by <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a></em> in <em>Unit</em>.

The required strings will be interned in <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/stringpool">StringPool</a></em>. 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
The child <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontext">DeclContext</a> along with one bit that is set if this context is invalid.
</SectionUser>

An invalid context means it shouldn&#39;t be considered for uniquing, but its not returning null, because some children of that context might be uniquing candidates.

FIXME: The invalid bit along the return value is to emulate some dsymutil-classic functionality.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/include/llvm/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinkerdeclcontext-h/#l00142">142</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/include/llvm/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinkerdeclcontext-h">DWARFLinkerDeclContext.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinkerdeclcontext-cpp/#l00048">48</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinkerdeclcontext-cpp">DWARFLinkerDeclContext.cpp</a>.
